main.title: Koyi Komai, Mallaki Komai
main.subtitle: Mai Taimakon Koyo na AI Na Ku
main.description: Samu taimako nan take da aikin gida, shirye-shiryen jarrabawa, da ci gaban sana'a. Ko kai dalibi ne na WAEC ko kuma kana iya haɓaka ƙwarewar aiki - muna nan 24/7 don taimaka maka cin nasara.
main.label: Bayyani

feature1.title: Malamin AI Na Ku
feature1.subtitle: Taimako Na Ƙwararru 24/7
feature1.description: Samu taimako na musamman koyaushe, ko'ina. Daga magance matsalolin lissafi masu wuyar gaske zuwa nazarin batutuwan kasuwanci - malamin AI naku yana daidaitawa da salon koyo da saurin ku.
feature1.label: Malamin AI

feature2.title: Bi Ci Gaban Ku
feature2.subtitle: Nazarin Koyo Na Gani
feature2.description: Duba kanka yana inganta tare da cikakken bin diddigin ci gaba, basirar aiki, da lambobin nasara. Yi bikin kowane nasara a tafiyar koyon ku.
feature2.label: Ci Gaba

feature3.title: Zai Zo Nan Ba Da Daɗewa Ba
feature3.subtitle: Sabbin Abubuwa Masu Ban Sha'awa
feature3.description: Muna gina kasuwar malamai, ingantaccen dashboard na iyaye, da kayan aikin cibiyoyi masu ƙarfi. Shiga al'ummarmu don zama na farko a layin waɗannan abubuwa masu ban mamaki.
feature3.label: Gaba
